Mayura offers great Indian food in a great contemporary and comfortable atmosphere.  I tried the chicken tikka masala and chicken korma.  Both very yummy.  The portions were just the right size to leave you stuffed as you walk out if you have had an appetizer and entree.  They have an extensive and interesting drink menu, but I had my meal with a couple mango lassis.   As far as price, I think it is a good value for what you get.One thing that also stands out from other Barcelona restaurants is the decor. It is nicely appointed in a comfortable atmosphere. There is a mix of contemporary and traditional. I highly recommend. In fact, I visited the restaurant twice during my last trip to Barcelona.
